tachyon.client.lineage

Class LineageMasterClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • tachyon.ClientBase
      • tachyon.MasterClientBase
        • tachyon.client.lineage.LineageMasterClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    @ThreadSafe
public final class LineageMasterClient
extends MasterClientBase
    A wrapper for the thrift client to interact with the lineage master, used by tachyon clients. Since thrift clients are not thread safe, this class is a wrapper to provide thread safety, and to provide retries.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class tachyon.ClientBase
